name: Amore, Appellant, v. Beaver County Building & Loan Construction Trade Council
name_abbreviation: Amore v. Beaver County Building & Loan Construction Trade Council

judges: Before Stern, C. J., Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.
parties: Amore, Appellant, v. Beaver County Building & Loan Construction Trade Council.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The Order in this ease is affirmed on the Opinion of President Judge McCreary of the Court of Common Pleas of Beaver County.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: C. John Tillman, with him Paul Kern Kirsch, Edwin M. Wallover, Kirsch & Weise, and Wallover & Barrickman, for appellants.
John D. Ray, with him Reed, Ewing & Ray, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Amore, Appellant, v. Beaver County Building & Loan Construction Trade Council.
Argued September 26, 1956.
Before Stern, C. J., Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.
C. John Tillman, with him Paul Kern Kirsch, Edwin M. Wallover, Kirsch & Weise, and Wallover & Barrickman, for appellants.
John D. Ray, with him Reed, Ewing & Ray, for appellees.
November 16, 1956:
